oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A letter from Herbert Solomon Garner to Letitia Hastings Garner about Maryville and Twin Lakes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garner, Herbert Solomon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Garner, Herbert Solomon; Garner, Letitia Hastings; Maryville (Tenn.); Mammoth Lakes (Calif.); Transcript
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter from Herbert Solomon Garner to Letitia Hastings Garner about updates from Maryville and asking about her trip to Twin Lakes
